{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola Solutions |model=AP 6521 |asin=B007YW627W;US; |fcc_date=02/02/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=UZ7AP6 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |fla1= |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_module=Motorola Solutions RM6 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54610 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=5C:0E:8B |oui_eth=5C:0E:8B }} {{TagLine|802.11n Indoor Access Point}} :[http://www.motorolasolutions.com/XU-EN/Business+Product+and+Services/Wireless+LAN/Access+Points+and+Ports/AP6521 Product page]{{â€¢}}[http://www.motorolasolutions.com/web/Business/Products/Wireless%20LAN%20Devices/WLAN%20Access%20Points/AP6521/_documents/_staticfiles/AP+6521_SS_0511.pdf Spec sheet]
===Noted models=== *AP-6521-60010-US, aka NCAP-500 (integral antennae) :FCC ID: UZ7AP6, OUI: 5C:0E:8B
===Models=== *[[Motorola Solutions AP 7161]] - 802.11n Outdoor Access Point :Tri 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 3x3:2 MIMO :26dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Ports :NEMA 4x Enclosure, Controller Independent *[[Motorola Solutions AP 7131N]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Tri 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 3x3:2 MIMO :27.7dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 2x GbE Ports :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable :*CPU: [[Cavium]] Octeon Plus CN5010 (@500MHz 1-cores MIPS64 SoC) :*WLAN: [[Atheros]] AR9160, 802.11abgn 2x MIMO 3x3, PCI (68-pin) :*RAM: 128MB (DDR2), OS: Wing 5.4 ([https://geektimes.ru/post/286062/ Review]) *[[Motorola Solutions AP 6532]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Dual 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 2x3:2 MIMO ([https://hsto.org/getpro/habr/comment_images/6dc/c57/bbf/6dcc57bbf4d2262ed4df899ec98bf48d.jpg PCB image]) :24dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable *[[Motorola Solutions AP 6521]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Single 802.11n Radio (Band Unlocked), 2x2:2 MIMO :30dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable *[[Motorola Solutions AP 6511]] - 802.11n Modular/Wallplate Access Point :Single 802.11n Radio (Band Unlocked), 2x2:2 MIMO :26dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Optional 3x Fast Ethernet Module (Pass-through) :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable *[[Motorola Solutions AP 650]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Dual 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 2x3:2 MIMO :24dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Controller Dependent *[[Motorola Solutions AP 621]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Single 802.11n Radio (Band Unlocked), 2x2:2 MIMO :24dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Atheros chipset (that supports granular spectrum analysis with ADSP) :Controller Dependent
